page_content:
Aphari Ltd

Aphari IT Multi-Sourcing Enterprise Architecture Modelling Accelerator

Aphari helps organisations transform their IT operating model, adopt cloud services, implement multi source delivery models, establish systems integration and service integration (SIAM) capabilities. Our enterprise architecture modelling accelerator service provides customers with the capability to link key data and visualise their architecture as it evolves through the multi-sourcing transformation.

Features

  • Enables consistent as-is (or baseline) architecture discovery and modelling.
  • Enables consistent to-be (or target) architecture definition and representation.
  • Maps business units, services, applications, infrastructure to locations and contracts
  • Maps relationships between datasets from different stakeholders giving joined-up view
  • Covers all architecture domains, including ITIL and COBIT process maps.
  • Integrates with systems of record to ensure completeness and currency.
  • Addresses specific concerns including multi-supplier solution dependency management.
  • Supports and underpins an ongoing Enterprise Architecture capability.
  • We take an holistic approach across architecture and interrelated functions.
  • Our framework includes MOP, MSP, PRINCE, COBIT, TOGAF, ArchiMate, ITIL.

Benefits

  • Helps customers transform their IT operating model and supply chain.
  • Provides evidence supporting transformation strategies and roadmaps for IT provision.
  • Provides key inputs into contract and programme scope definition
  • Enables consistent presentation and articulation of architectures across all suppliers.
  • Provides techniques and knowledge that enable SACM and CMDB adoption
  • Open standards ensure no vendor or tooling lock-in.
  • Mitigates specific architecture and solution risks arising from multi-vendor models.
  • Open standards expedite capability uplift and knowledge transfer.
  • Our methods and techniques proven in complex multi-supplier environments.
  • Our holistic approach speaks to stakeholders in their own language.

Pricing

£950 per unit

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Day
